casebody.data:
ACTS RETIREMENT-LIFE COMMUNITIES, INC.
v.
TOWN OF COLUMBUS 334PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2017 Ryan D. Bolick, Attorney at Law, Virginia M. Wooten, Charlotte, Attorney at Law, for Town of Columbus, North Carolina. Benjamin R. Sullivan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for ACTS Retirement-Life Communities, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of March 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of March 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 18th day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
